item.title: Bat colony checks in to hotel; 200 guests check out, unaware of rabies scare
item.description: The risk is likely low for most, but rabies is nearly 100 percent fatal.

item.title: AI in Wyoming may soon use more electricity than state’s human residents
item.description: Proposed datacenter would demand 5x Wyoming’s current power use at full deployment.
